customErrorMessages.errorMessage: No primary Applicant exists on the Application

recordUpdates.name: update_the_pending_approved_cancellation_date
recordUpdates.label: update the pending approved / cancellation date

textTemplates.name: EDD_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hi, 

This Application has been marked as High Risk. Please fill in the EDD and attach it to the Application. 

The link to the Application: {!OrgURL}

Best regards,

The Underwriting Team

textTemplates.name: EDD_Notification_Body
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Name}: Please Fill in the "ENHANCED DUE DILIGENCE" Form

textTemplates.name: StageChangeNotificationBody
textTemplates.text: The application has been approved. Please fill answer all the compliance questions and attach the Signed Commitment to move forward.

textTemplates.name: TC_Notification_Body
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Name}: Please Fill in the UTR Form

textTemplates.name: UTR_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hi, 

This Application has been marked as suspicious. Please fill in the UTR and attach it to the Application. 

The link to the Application: {!OrgURL}

Best regards,

The Underwriting Team
